summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements from Marjorie A. Little and Frederick A. Westfall, as guardian of the estate and person of Katherine Westfall, across a portion of the south one-half of the south one-half of the north one-half of the southwest one-quarter of the northwest one-quarter of Section 34, township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for sanitary sewer and watermain purposes.
